package logical

// Generated by msgen. DO NOT EDIT.

import(
	"context"
	"some/service/ops"
	"some/service/state"
)

type client struct {
	s state.State
}

func New(s state.State) *client {

	return &client{
		s: s,
	}
}

func (c *client) Ping(
	ctx context.Context,
	int64Value int64,
	stringValue string,
) error {

	return ops.Ping(
		ctx,
		c.s,
		int64Value,
		stringValue,
	)
}

func (c *client) Pong(
	ctx context.Context,
) (int64, string, error) {

	return ops.Pong(
		ctx,
		c.s,
	)
}
